description:
Not too snug and not too loose, this jersey is just right for those gravel grinds. Much like gravel bikes are offroad road bikes, the Gravel jersey is an offroad road jersey; giving you more room to breathe than a typical road jersey, without being a billowing Watt robber.

  • Stretchy poly blend wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Mesh panels under the arms for improved cooling and breathability
  • Anti-slip silicone grips at the hem keep the jersey from riding up
  • Lots of pocket space for snacks, tools, warmers, a shell, really anything you might want
  • Vislon® zipper stays where you want it, no creeping
  • Full-length zip is easy to get on and off, plus makes on-the-fly temperature adjustments easy
  • UPF50+ blocks more than 98% of harsh UV
  • OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Regular fit offers a trim, aerodynamic fit, without being too snug
name: Peppermint Gravel Jersey - Women's
